title: Association between dysphagia risk and sleep quality in community-dwelling older adults: A cross-sectional study
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Yohko Hama, Sachiko Yamada, Rumi Nishimura, Mitsuyoshi Yoshida, Kazuhiro Tsuga, Emi Morita, Yudai Tamada, Yasufumi Kato, Yoko Kubo, Rieko Okada, Mako Nagayoshi, Takashi Tamura, Asahi Hishida, Kenji Wakai, Mariko Naito
